name: Citadel
overview: Citadel changed Superior Software's fortunes quite substantially. It was an excellent graphical adventure and puzzle game. With over a hundred different screens, good graphics and great gameplay, Citadel was destined to be a classic. The object of the game was to escape the great Citadel. You achieved this by solving various puzzles, opening doors with colour coded keys, and generally being brainy. It's still very playable.
